long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension is an extension meant for the software used in Code Ninja locations across the US, UK and Canada. Once people get to certain point in their progress they enter a Code Ninjas created software known as GDP. This software does not auto-save which results in many people losing their code. Hence this extension; created by a Code Ninjas Newport Beach employee in order to prevent losing code from ever happening again. Happy coding -Joseph (: 

(this extension is currently in beta testing), feel free to send possible issues.
